sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
    class="mx-auto"
    width="400" 
  >
    <template v-slot:title>{{user.username}}</template>

    <v-card-text>
      This is content
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>

import axios from 'axios';
export default {
    name:'UserDetail',
    props:["user"],
    created(){ 
        
        axios.post('http://localhost:5000/users',{
            id:this.$route.params.id,
        }).then(response=>{
            this.user = response.data;
        });
    }
}
</script>
